title: Must See Totally Remodeled Tremont 2BR/Study/1Ba/Off-street parking
posting_body: THIS IS AN ABSOLUTELY AWESOME 2 BEDROOM AND PRIVATE STUDY, like new that just finished a major update and renovation in past month,  right on Professor Avenue with wonderful views of Saint Thikon, Etc.
THIS IS A MUST SEE UNIT THAT YOU WILL
LOVE - IT IS AN INCREDIBLE ONE OF A KIND UNIT WITH ONE OF THE BEST ADDRESSES AND LOCATIONS IN TOWN - right on Professor Avenue in the heart of the Tremont Historic District!
Easily walk to the Tow Path or all your favorite Tremont eateries and boutique shops just steps away from your front door!

This is a very nice over-sized Double with beautiful immaculate totally updated Kitchen with all new cabinets, dishwasher, and granite countertops, wonderful Roomy Living Room, nice sized bedrooms that can accommodate a king size bed, thermal pane windows throughout, freshly painted, all new flooring throughout  - it truly is a MUST see!
This unit has Great Curb appeal next to Lucky Park!
Nice amounts of room in this much larger sized Tremont double - 1300 sq ft plus!
Please email us via this ad with your name and phone number and we will return a call to you to share more information.
